src_original: Wal_3 atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa / āgamayānanda yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramiṣyāvaḥ /
Wal_4 evaṁ bhadaṁta āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /

Wal_5 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / āyuṣmān ānando niṣīdanam aṁsenāropya bhagavaṁtaṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ … myānulomatayā / Wal_6 atha bhagavāṁ gandhamādanaṁ caityam abhyavagāhya yenānyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / upasaṁkramya āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa / Wal_7 prajñapayānandāsmiṁ vṛkṣamūle tathāgatasya niṣīdanaṁ pṛṣṭhī me āglāyati tāṁ tāvad āyāmayiṣye /
